English: I enjoy reading books in my free time.
French: J'aime lire des livres pendant mon temps libre.

English: He plays soccer every Saturday morning.
French: Il joue au football tous les matins de semaine.

English: They often go for a walk in the park.
French: Ils se promènent souvent dans le parc.

English: She likes to cook and try new recipes.
French: Elle aime cuisiner et essayer de nouvelles recettes.
